meta_theses.theme: Bottleneck shifted from digital to physical
meta_theses.description: Software/intelligence approaching sufficiency. Constraints now: energy, manufacturing, physical dexterity, zoning, infrastructure.
As AI handles information/production, human advantage is caring, empathy, taste, critical evaluation.
Opposing dollar frameworks both conclude: buy gold. Johnson (dollar + gold up together), Taleb (dollar declining, gold up).
meta_theses.note: Agreement on conclusion despite disagreement on mechanism

meta_theses.description: Moats in regulated industries and domain expertise, not in building models or base infrastructure.
Multiple domains facing closing windows: DeFi before AI, steer AI before too powerful, preserve human thinking before atrophy, scale energy before chips outpace grid.

contradictions.description: Johnson: US will always fund deficits, dollar strengthens. Taleb: Dollar losing reserve status, debt is a doom loop.
contradictions.resolution: Both agree gold goes up. Disagreement is on dollar trajectory — possibly different timeframes (short-term flows vs. long-term structural).

contradictions.description: Musk: AI tutors (Grok) for personalized education in El Salvador. Loh: Kids without tech are more creative, tech atrophies mental fitness.
contradictions.resolution: Depends on implementation. AI as thinking partner vs. AI as answer machine. Loh's concern is valid if AI replaces struggle rather than scaffolding it.

contradictions.description: Taleb: Current AI leaders will go bankrupt (pioneer pattern). Amodei: Scaling laws keep working, current leaders have compounding advantage.
contradictions.resolution: Taleb's pattern is historical (IBM, Pan Am), but AI may be different — scaling laws create winner-take-all dynamics unlike previous tech revolutions.

testable_predictions.claim: China passes 3x US electricity output in 2026
testable_predictions.speaker: elon-musk
